page.title: 07RECREATION/FOOTBALL
page.content: School Games in the Rec. We walk to the Rec. in our football kit with our teacher Mr Constable. Tuesday afternoon is the time we practise and then on Fridays after school the 'A' and 'B' teams are given further coaching. We leave bags on the bench and begin to train. Football is a game of skill and we practise passing, headers and throwing on. There are seven people in the team, a goalie, two defenders, one mid-field and three forwards. Boys play to the Junior Rules. We have entered the Errey's Tournament on Saturday 12 October and the Small Schools Tournament on Wednesday 16 October. I think we stand a good chance of winning a cup because we've fielded a strong side this term.
